With the seawall minutes from your front door, transit at your fingertips, a plethora of Vancouver's finest restaurants, theatres, boutique shopping and any amenity you could possibly desire in the heart of the city. This will make the urban pad you've lways dreamed of your reality.

Great layout on the super bright main level and upstairs you'll find 3 very large bedrooms. Some updates with in the past few years include the flooring, furnace and the hot water tank. Great location close to shopping, schools and recreation. Come have a look, you'll be impressed!

Public Remarks: Exceptional value! 'Retro-Lofts'. Concrete Building. One owner, immaculate condition, one bedroom with excellent layout. Features open plan with gourmet kitchen, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, reclaimed fir floors, slate tile, gas fireplace & wood accents throughout. Updated lighting & Hunter Douglas ceiling fans accent the 10' ceilings. Conveniences include, large walk in closet, in-suite laundry, in-suite storage room & locker. Large 9'6 x 8' southern exposed balcony perfect for those summer BBQ's! Building amenities include exercise room, common area courtyard & bike storage. South Granville shopping, UBC bus, Canada Line, Richmond, YVR & Fraser River Park!

Public Remarks: The Morgan. Resort style living in the heart of popular Grandview Corners/Morgan Crossing. This truly unique 2 bedroom plus den has much to offer.Townhome style living with 2 entrances. Walk-out to street from front deck (great for pets) yet above ground level for added security. A full wall divider on the deck ensures complete privacy from the neighbouring unit. Inside find Luxury finishes, Stainless appliances, The f/p and bright fresh paint give this imaculate home a warm cozy feel. Lets not forget the valuable second (side by side) parking spot; both conveniently located right by the stairs. A quality building with State of the art amenties, remainder of home warranty 5/10 still in place. Shopping, cafes, & restaurants.

Public Remarks: Immaculate tastefully up-dated 2 bedroom & den, 1 bath 1 level townhouse overlooking Burnaby Mountain Golf Course in quiet & green Montecito with large 20x12 garden patio.Nice open floor plan & fully renovated in 2006 with laminate floors , new doors, fresh paint, cheerful white new kitchen with pantry, new bath. Feature corner gas fireplace in living room. Plenty of room to fit house size furniture. Extra large master bedroom (was 2 bedrooms) plus 2nd bedroom has walk-in closet.High efficiency furnace with electronic air cleaner. Suite storage conveniently off your own patio. 1 underground parking. 2 pets allowed, no reptiles. Maximum 5 rentals.

Public Remarks: TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom 1,334 square foot gorgeous townhome in Westside Court in West Maple Ridge. Full driveway & Garage (lots of visitor parking close). Traditional floor plan. Beautiful laminate flooring throughout the main. Features gas fireplace, big windows, vaulted ceilings. BRAND NEW GORGEOUS KITCHEN w/New chic white cabinets, huge pantry, tones of storage, trendy wood countertop, stainless steel appliancess. Eating area opens to the large sunny fully fenced backyard. New paint throughout. Renovated bathrms incl a spa like ensuite with massive brand new shower. Fantastic location close to shopping, schools, West Coast Express, Golden Ears Bridge, Lougheed Hwy. Family & Pet Friendly. MUST SEE! Watch the VIRTUAL TOUR.

Public Remarks: This newly renovated townhouse is ready for you to move into. The floor plan encompasses 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms & a new sleek & stylish kitchen that flows through to the living/dining room & private rear patio & backyard. New laminate flooring has been installed throughout the house as well as alpine slate in the kitchen, entranceway & 3 bedrooms. The gas fireplace in the living room has been beautifully updated with slate ledge stone & contains hidden wires above the mantel for a complete TV & surround system. The ensuite in the master bdrm has a custom W/I shower complete with 2 rain showerheads, a dbl sink vanity & brazilian granite. Granite in addit. bathroom & soaker tub. Walking distance to schools, parks & stores.
Realtor Remarks: Pls call Virginia or touchbase for viewing. All room sizes & measurements are approx. only. Buyer to verify if necessary. Notice needed, 2 dogs & a baby in the house.

Public Remarks: Absolutely beautifully renovated Heritage Home in downtown Chilliwack Area. Updated electrical, plumbing, new bathrooms with claw foot tub and large sit down shower, new kitchen, vinyl windows, patios, newer roof. Detached garage fr om rear lane has an attached carport. Beautifully landscaped and fenced with large rear yard. Just move in and enjoy. Walk to shopping. A must see!
Realtor Remarks: Home is on Heritage List but not registered as Heritage.

Public Remarks: Welcome home to this spotless Brighton townhouse in charming Silver Valley. This home is in better than new condition & features a large 2 car garage with plenty of extra storage space, immaculate high quality carpet, & beautiful laminate floors on the main. You'll find plenty of space to relax and entertain with a large open concept main floor, and 2 large bdrms and 2 baths up. The functional kitchen features a huge island with breakfast bar, custom frosted glass pantry door, & granite countertops. Adjacent to the kitchen is a large dining room with a custom art light fixture, elegant built-in cabinetry, & a large south-facing window. The master features plenty of closet space & a 3 pc ensuite. Open house Sat Jan 18th 2-4pm!
Realtor Remarks: Please give 24hr notice for all showings.

Public Remarks: Wonderful 3 level townhome in Polygon's Brooklands. At 1374 sqft, this 3 bedroom townhome feels like a house with it's well designed open concept. All laminate floors on the main with a breakfast bar that looks out onto the large living room, complete with gas fireplace. Walk out your patio doors to your sunny west facing yard, perfect for enjoying, as there are no other units behind you. Super close to the mailboxes and clubhouse, pool, and gym. New paint, new lighting, stainless steel appliances. Low maintenance fees.
Realtor Remarks: Don't forget to show your clients the fantastic amenities!

Public Remarks: OSPREY by MOSAIC. A village on the Fraser River with your local coffee house, yoga studio, doggy daycare & more. Close to Fremont Village, the West Coast Express, Golden Ears Bridge & within an 8-minute drive to schools. This FRANKLIN series 2 bdrm & den is iconic with its Georgian inspired architecture and black rod iron window boxes. Come see for yourself the huge windows, stunning open-riser staircase and 9' ceiling on the entry and main floors. Crisp white cabinetry, cabinet-finish open shelving in the kitchen with stone counters & a full-width mirror w/ feature millwork ledge in ensuite. Den is the perfect office. 1 car parking. Model homes open daily 12-6 PM. Move in this Winter.
Realtor Remarks: **2813 OSPREY FIVE HOLDING LIMITED. Sales by Disclosure Statement. Measurements from Architectural Plans. Please give us a call if you're not able to visit with your buyers. More floor plans and info on www.mosaichomes.com/osprey

Public Remarks: Lovely 1 bed & den in popular CALYPSO at the corner of 4th and Lonsdale in the heart of Lower Lonsdale. LOLO. This third floor suite faces south with a great view of the tropical like court yard. This building has been rainscreened and is in great condition. This suite offers an open SUNNY floor plan, functional kitchen, in suite laundry and a den which can be used as a 2nd bedroom. Great location just steps to all the funky shops LOLO lifestyle has to offer plus easy walk to the Quay and Sea Bus for those working downtown. Call today for a private showing!
Realtor Remarks: All offers must be accompanied with Schedule A provided by listing agent. To be sold as is / where is basis. Please allow sufficient time for showings and acceptance of any offers. Suite is in very good shape although occupant has a lot of boxes thru-out, ext cluttered.

Public Remarks: Solid 5 bedroom family home just a few minutes walk from Uplands School. Wood fireplaces up and down add cozy warmth to the living and entertaining areas. The deck off the kitchen is covered and perfect for winter or rainy day BBQ'ing, whil e the staircase leads down to the nicely private patio for summertime fun with friends and family. The backyard is spacious and private, just right for kids and pets. The current owner converted the single garage to office space, which will easily convert back to garage, or for a company or professional coming to the area, this may be the perfect combination of home away from home, complete with office space and crew accommodation. The kitchenette area downstairs is ideal for this use.

PERFECT RETIREMENT RANCHER IN 55+ GATED COMMUNITY 1786 sqft home -one of the largest in the community with an extra DEN. Has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a bright open kitchen and nook area, formal dining room, living room with a gas fireplace. There's a jetted soaker tub in large master bedroom suite with lots of storage. The laundry/storage room is large (washer and dryer not included) Relax on the front or back patio's to get both morning and evening sun. This Special Home is a must to view.
Realtor Remarks: S.Comm 3.25% on 1st 100K/1.16% on Bal. Please notify Don for showing with proper notice. Meter for gas F.P. removed as it wasn't being used. Buyer needs to reconnect. Air conditioner in closet and needs to be installed. Seller never used it and doesn't know it's condition.

Public Remarks: Simply GORGEOUS TOP floor 1 bed + den condo at Green by Adera. An amazing development next to Byrnecreek Park with water features and trails. Home boasts 9' ceilings & 14' in living room, beautiful hardwood flooring, cozy fireplace, modern open kitchen w/ granite counters, stainles steel appliances plus a good sized balcony for BBQs. Den makes a great office or guest bedroom. Eco friendly home first class amenities including yoga room, exercise room, infrared sauna, billiards room and greaet party room w/ huge deck. Comes with a convenient parking spot and locker. Short walk to Edmonds Skytrain & minutes to Market Crossing shopping.

Public Remarks: Nestled away on 2 beautiful treed acres, this nearly new home, boasts an enormous tiled entrance way leading to a spacious great room with soaring vaulted ceilings. Custom built, the home has hardwood and tile flooring throughout, a large h ickory kitchen with ample counter space, tonnes of main floor storage, and a big open layout that is sure to please. The basement is completely finished with all new bathroom, laminate flooring, plus is freshly painted top to bottom with modern colours. A detached workshop completes this perfect package and is a great man cave and place to store your toys. Measurements approx. buyer to verify if important.

Public Remarks: This 1915 Tudor Revival style English manor was built for lawyer and whiskey baron Edward Tulk, who named it after his only daughter, Rosemary. Architects Maclure & Fox were British Columbia's most prominent designers of substantial homes. Subsequent occupants were John W.Fordham Johnson, later Lieutenant-Governor of B.C., and Austin Taylor, owner of the Bralorne gold mine. This Magnificent mansion sitting on over 39000 SF huge lot. It is in good original condition and comes with a Heritage Register' and a city of Vancouver Designation. The original wood paneling, mouldings, and hardware are all fully intact and ready for renovations.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate. Buyer to verify if important. Square footages include the coach house that is attached via an archway to the main house. http://www.imagemaker360.com/128809
